Package imagingbook.common.image

Class GridIndexer2D.ZeroValueIndexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.common.image.GridIndexer2D
      • imagingbook.common.image.GridIndexer2D.ZeroValueIndexer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Enclosing class:
    GridIndexer2D
    public static class GridIndexer2D.ZeroValueIndexer
extends GridIndexer2D
    This indexer returns -1 for coordinates outside the image bounds, indicating that a (predefined) default value should be used. There is no public constructor. To instantiate use method GridIndexer2D.create(int, int, OutOfBoundsStrategy) with OutOfBoundsStrategy.ZeroValues.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class imagingbook.common.image.GridIndexer2D
